ca.gkelly.engine.collision

Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.gkelly.engine.collision.Collider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectCollider

    public class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic collider class
    has functions to handle generic polygon collision detection

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double height

    • Method Detail

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(Collider c)
        Checks if 2 colliders are close enough for collision events to occur
        Parameters:
        c - The Collider to check against
        Returns:
        True if the distance between the midpoints is less than the combined radii

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Collider c)
        Checks if any point is contained
        Parameters:
        c - The Collider to check against
        Returns:
        True if all any point is contained

        Returns:
        True if all points are contained

      • getIntersections

        public Vertex[] getIntersections(Collider c)
        Get all intersections between the edges of colliders
        Parameters:
        c - The other collider to check against
        Returns:
        An array containing the intersection Vertices

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vertex v)
        Return true if the given point is contained inside the boundary.
        Override for contains(double, double)
        Parameters:
        v - The Vertex to check
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the boundary, false otherwise

        Returns:
